definitions.definition: The sound one makes when belching.
To expel (gas) loudly from the stomach through the mouth.
definitions.example: My father used to belch after having a fine meal.

definitions.definition: To eject or emit (something) with spasmodic force or noise.
definitions.example: Yes, we have seen the wrecked cars and the factories belching smoke and the blur of speedy automobiles crowding highways.

definitions.definition: To be ejected or emitted (from something) with spasmodic force or noise.
